events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because the product is not what I paid for.
System has detected keywords related to a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
The case has been assigned to customer service agent Anna Smith for further handling.
Hello, this is Anna from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for the incorrect item. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. Attached is a photo showing the wrong product that was shipped to me.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 3 to 5 business days and send you a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund process information. I appreciate your help with resolving this issue.
Your refund has been successfully initiated and should reflect in your account within the next few days.
We are following up to ensure your refund was received successfully and that you have no further issues.
Since your issue was resolved and no further concerns were reported, the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting us.
